cmd.onlyPM: *This command can only be used in private messages.*
cmd.onlyGroup: *This command can only be used in groups.*
cmd.wrongwelcomePfp_gpp_img: *Both {gpp} and {img: ..} cannot be used when sending the {%c} message. Please remove one.*
cmd.wrongwelcomePfp_gpp_vid: *Both {gpp} and {vid: ..} cannot be used when sending the {%c} message. Please remove one.*
cmd.wrongwelcomePfp_img_vid: *Both {vid: ..} and {img: ..} cannot be used when sending the {%c} message. Please remove one.*
cmd.wrongalive_pp_img: *Both {pp} and {img: ..} cannot be used when sending alive message. Please remove one.*
cmd.wrongalive_pp_vid: *Both {pp} and {vid: ..} cannot be used when sending alive message. Please remove one.*
cmd.wrongalive_img_vid: *Both {vid: ..} and {img: ..} cannot be used when sending alive message. Please remove one.*
cmd.nopfp: *To use {pp} in an alive message, first set a profile picture!*

ping.badping: If commands are being detected slowly, try refreshing the QR code!

session.bad: The Session Is No More Useful. Please Re-Scan The QR Code and Replace Old One.
session.out: Logout! Please, Rescan the QR Code!

goodbye.not_set_goodbye: _No goodbye messages are set for this chat._
goodbye.alr_set_goodbye: _Goodbye message is set in this chat. Message:_

welcome.not_set_welcome: _No welcome messages are set for this chat!_
welcome.alr_set_welcome: _Welcome message is set in this chat. Message:_

module.ping2: _Controls the running speed of the bot._
module.textpro3:
ðŸ”¹ ```&textpro {type} {text}``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```&textpro neon Atticus```

module.welcome2: _Automatically sends messages to new members who join the group._
module.welcome3:
ðŸ”¹ ```&welcome``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```&welcome Welcome The Group``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```&welcome delete``` (Removes the Message) 
 ðŸ”¹ ```&welcome <reply a message>``` 

*Additional Features:* 

{gpp}: _Welcome message is sent with group profile photo._ 
{img}: _Welcome message is sent with any picture._
Example: _{img: https://i.hizliresim.com/ifo5s63.jpg}_

{vid}: _The welcome message is sent via video._
Example: _{vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OuajHe9SdSk}_
module.goodbye2: _Automatically sends messages to new members who leave the group._

module.no_pfp: *Group picture not available. Therefore, the welcome message could not be sent. Please set a group photo!*
module.error_img: *The image in the entered {img: ..} is not valid. Please type* ```.menu welcome``` *to see usage. There should be no additional spaces and the image link should have a .png or .jpg extension.*
module.raw_error_img: *The image in the entered {img: ..} is not valid. There should be no additional spaces and the image link should have a .png or .jpg extension.*
module.error_vid: *The youtube link in the entered {vid: ..} is not valid. Please type* ```.menu welcome``` *to see usage. There should be no additional spaces and the video should be youtube link.*
module.raw_error_vid: *The youtube link in the entered {vid: ..} is not valid. There should be no additional spaces and the video should be youtube link.*
